name: idbx
description: No-bullshit indexedDB wrapper functions with promises, iterators and shortcuts.

scripts.bundleDts: echo "$(grep -o '".*"' dest/types/main.d.ts | sed 's/"//g' | xargs -I{} cat dest/types/{})" > dest/idbx.d.ts
scripts.build: rimraf dest && node ./esbuild.js && npm run ts-types && npm run replaceDts && npm run bundleDts && rimraf dest/types
